title: Elon Musk Deletes Controversial Post About Trump Assassination Bid
content: Elon Musk has deleted a post he wrote on X after the assassination attempt on former US President Donald Trump on Sunday in Florida.
summary: Elon Musk has deleted a post he wrote on X after the assassination attempt on former US President Donald Trump on Sunday in Florida.

title: Mini-Moon With Mahabharata Connection Will Not Be Visible To Eyes: ISRO
content: The temporary mini-moon of Earth, which will orbit our planet for 53 days, will not be visible to the naked eye, confirmed Dr AK Anil Kumar, head of ISRO's Network for Space Objects Tracking and Analysis (NETRA).
summary: The temporary mini-moon of Earth, which will orbit our planet for 53 days, will not be visible to the naked eye, confirmed Dr AK Anil Kumar, head of ISRO's Network for Space Objects Tracking and Analysis (NETRA).

title: At Global Meet, PM Modi Lays Down 1,000 Year Vision For Sustainable Energy
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi said India is preparing for a sustainable energy path for the next 1,000 years, focusing on solar, wind, nuclear and hydropower.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi said India is preparing for a sustainable energy path for the next 1,000 years, focusing on solar, wind, nuclear and hydropower.

title: Russians Urged To Have Sex During Work Breaks Amid Declining Birth Rate
content: The initiative comes as Russia's fertility rate, currently at about 1.5 children per woman, falls significantly below the 2.1 rate required to maintain a stable population.
summary: The initiative comes as Russia's fertility rate, currently at about 1.5 children per woman, falls significantly below the 2.1 rate required to maintain a stable population.

title: British Man Develops Flesh-Eating Disease After Being Bitten By Spider

title: Student From Telangana Drowns In Lake In Canada On His Birthday
content: A man from Telangana, who went to Canada to pursue his Masters, drowned while swimming with his friends in a lake in Toronto.

title: Historic Tuscan Villa Once Favoured By Queen Victoria Hits Market For...

title: AI Can Debunk Conspiracy Theories Better Than Humans

title: Trump Shooting Suspect Planned To Recruit Afghan Soldiers To Fight In Ukraine
content: A 58-year-old man detained in connection with an apparent assassination attempt on former president Donald Trump has said in an interview in 2023 that he planned to recruit potential Afghan soldiers through Pakistan to fight in Ukraine against Russia
summary: A 58-year-old man detained in connection with an apparent assassination attempt on former president Donald Trump has said in an interview in 2023 that he planned to recruit potential Afghan soldiers through Pakistan to fight in Ukraine against Russia

title: Rosie, The World's Oldest Cat, Dies At 33
content: Rosie, the world's oldest cat, is dead. Her owner Lila Brisset recently bid farewell to Rosie, the fluffy tortoiseshell cat believed to be the oldest in the world.
summary: Rosie, the world's oldest cat, is dead. Her owner Lila Brisset recently bid farewell to Rosie, the fluffy tortoiseshell cat believed to be the oldest in the world.

title: Explosion In Germany's Cologne, "Major Police Operation" Going On
content: A police operation is underway after an explosion in central Cologne, the Bild newspaper reported on Monday.

title: UK PM Starmer Meets Italy PM Meloni To Discuss Illegal Immigration
content: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer meets Italian counterpart Giorgia Meloni in Rome on Monday to discuss tackling illegal immigration, a day after another Channel migrant shipwreck claimed eight lives.

title: Italy Tests AI-assisted Teaching In Schools To Boost IT Skills

title: Japan's Elderly Population Hits Record High, Government Data Reveals
content: The number of people in Japan aged 65 or older hit a record high of 36.25 million this year, government data shows, as the country contends with one of the world's fastest-ageing societies.
summary: The number of people in Japan aged 65 or older hit a record high of 36.25 million this year, government data shows, as the country contends with one of the world's fastest-ageing societies.

title: Pakistan Court Grants Bail To 10 Of Former PM Imran Khan's MPs
content: An anti-terrorism court in Pakistan granted bail on Monday to 10 MPs from former prime minister Imran Khan's party, an AFP journalist witnessed.
summary: An anti-terrorism court in Pakistan granted bail on Monday to 10 MPs from former prime minister Imran Khan's party, an AFP journalist witnessed.

title: Bebinca, The Strongest Typhoon To Hit Shanghai In 70 Years, Makes Landfall
content: The strongest storm to hit Shanghai in over 70 years made landfall on Monday, with flights cancelled and highways closed as Typhoon Bebinca lashed the city with strong winds and torrential rains.
summary: The strongest storm to hit Shanghai in over 70 years made landfall on Monday, with flights cancelled and highways closed as Typhoon Bebinca lashed the city with strong winds and torrential rains.
